channel.title: Blaine County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Blaine County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: ID-75 North at US-20
item.description: ID-75 north at US-20. Use US-20 east for Carey; US-20 west for Fairfield. Continue north to Sun Valley.

item.title: US-20 East/US-26 East/US-93 North - Road Closure Info
item.description: US-20 East/US-26 East/US-93 North - Road Closure Information in Carey. US-26/US-26/US-93 between Carey and Arco is open.

item.title: US-26 East/US-93 North at US-20
item.description: US-26 East/US-93 North at US-20 in Carey. Turn left for US-20 west to Picabo. Continue straight for US-20 East/US-26 East/US-93 North to Arco and Idaho Falls.

item.title: US-26 East/US-93 North at US-20
item.description: US-26 East/US-93 North at US-20 in Carey. Use US-20 for the Peaks To Craters Scenic Byway.

item.title: US-26 East/US-93 North Approaching US-20
item.description: US-26 East/US-93 North approaching US-20 in Carey.

item.title: US-26 East/US-93 North - Entering Carey
item.description: Entering Carey on US-26 East/US-93 North.

item.title: US-26 East/US-93 North - Cell Phone Use - Hands Free Only
item.description: Cell Phone Use - Hands Free Only Per Local (Blaine County) ordinance on US-26 East/US-93 North. The state of Idaho as a whole does allow hand held cell phone use.

item.title: US-26 East/US-93 North - Blaine County
item.description: Entering Blane County on US-26 East/US-93 North.

item.title: ID-75 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-75 north. Distance to Stanley, Challis, and Salmon. Milemarker 129. The milemarkers on ID-75 continue reflect the distance from the Idaho-Nevada state line (via US-93) rather than the beginning of ID-75. Originally, ID-75 was signed as US-93.

item.title: ID-75 North at US-20
item.description: ID-75 north at US-20. Use US-20 east for Carey; US-20 west for Fairfield. Continue north to Sun Valley.

item.title: ID-75 North - Blaine County
item.description: Entering Blaine County on ID-75 north.

item.title: US-20 West - Entering Camas County
item.description: Entering Camas County on US-20 west at the Blaine-Camas County Line.

item.title: US-20 West at ID-75
item.description: US-20 west at ID-75. ID-75 is the Sawtooth Scenic Byway

item.title: US-20 West Approaching ID-75
item.description: US-20 west approaching ID-75 north to Sun Valley, and south to Shoshone. Continue west on US-20 for Boise.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West/US-93 South Jct.
item.description: US-20/US-26 West/US-93 South at split in Carey. Use US-20 west for Sun Valley and Boise. Use US-26 West/US-93 South for Twin Falls.

item.title: US-20/US-93/US-26 Approaching US-20 Split
item.description: US-20 West/US-26 West/US-93 South approaching US-20 split.

item.title: US-20 East at ID-75
item.description: US-20 east to Idaho Falls at ID-75 to Sun Valley and Shoshone.

item.title: US-20 East at US-26/US-93
item.description: US-20 west at US-26/US-93 south to Shoshone, and north to Arco and Idaho Falls. US-20 joins US-26/US-93 east to Arco.
